required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Biological Activity of Cediranib (AZD2171) in Gastro-Intestinal Stromal Tumours(GIST).
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-Label, Phase II Study to Evaluate the Biological Activity of Cediranib (AZD2171) as Measured by [F 18] Fluoro 2 Deoxy D Glucose - Positron Emission Tomography (FDG-PET) Response, in Patients With Metastatic Gastro-Intestinal Stromal Tumours (GIST) Resistant or Intolerant to Imatinib Mesylate

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the anti-tumour activity and biological effects of cediranib (AZD2171) at a dose of 45mg, primarily in Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumour (GIST) patients who are resistant to imatinib mesylate (current standard therapy) and also in patients with metastatic Soft Tissue Sarcoma (STS) resistant to standard therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Standardised Uptake Value (SUV)Max at Day 8, Central Review, (GIST) Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumours Patients.
primary_outcome.description: [F 18] Fluoro 2 Deoxy D Glucose - Positron Emission Tomography (FDG-PET). Tumour metabolic activity as assessed by Change in Standardised Uptake Value (SUVMax) at Day 8 (measured by central review), in Patients with GIST tumours. SUVmax at Day 8 minus SUVmax at Baseline.

primary_outcome.measure: Tumour Metabolic Activity as Assessed by Change in Central Review of Standardised Uptake Value (SUVMax) at Day 29, in Patients With GIST Tumours. SUVmax at Day 29 Minus SUVmax at Baseline.
primary_outcome.time_frame: FDG-PET assessment at Baseline and 29 days after dosing.
primary_outcome.description: SUVmax at Day 29 minus SUVmax at baseline, based on central review, GIST patients

secondary_outcome.time_frame: RECIST at Baseline, Weeks 8, 16 and every 12 weeks thereafter until progression.
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with complete (CR) /partial response (PR) (based on RECIST) as assessed by the Investigator. CR is defined as Disappearance of all target lesions. PR is defined as at least a 30% decrease in the sum of Longest Diameter (LD) of target lesions taking as reference the baseline sum LD.

secondary_outcome.measure: -Tumour Activity as Measured by Major Axis (Axial Plane) at Week 8 in GIST/STS Patients by Central Review of CT Images.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: CT assessments at Baseline and Week 8
secondary_outcome.description: Central review of CT images taking the longest diameter measured in millimetres at week 8 [major axis (axial plane)] minus the longest diameter measured in millimetres at baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-tumour Activity as Measured by Major Axis (Axial Plane) at Week 16 in GIST/STS Patients by Central Review of CT Images.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: CT assessments at Baseline and Week 16.
secondary_outcome.description: Central review of CT images taking the longest diameter measured in millimetres at week 16 [major axis (axial plane)] minus the longest diameter measured in millimetres at baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Tumour Activity as Measured by Total Lesion Volume at Week 8 in GIST Patients by Central Review of CT Images.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: CT assessments at Baseline and Week 8
secondary_outcome.description: Central review of CT images taking the total lesion volume at week 8 minus the total lesion volume at baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-tumour Activity as Measured by Total Lesion Volume at Week 16 in GIST Patients by Central Review of CT Images.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: CT assessments at Baseline and Week 16
secondary_outcome.description: Central review of CT images taking the total lesion volume at week 16 minus the total lesion volume at baseline.

intervention.description: 45 mg oral tablet once daily dose

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histological or cytological confirmation of GIST which is resistant or intolerant to imatinib mesylate, or metastatic STS, which is refractory to standard therapies or for which no standard therapy exists
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with type I insulin-dependent diabetes or poorly-controlled type II insulin-independent diabetes.
- Patients with a history of poorly controlled high blood pressure

link.description: Astrazeneca Information - outside of the US

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Enrolled: 45mg GIST=26, 45mg STS=10; Full analysis set: 45mg GIST=25, 45mg STS=10; Safety set: 45mg GIST=24, 45mg STS=10. 36 patients were enrolled and 35 patients were randomized. One GIST patient consented but had an adverse event and was withdrawn from the study before they were randomised.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day GIST
group.description: 26 Gastrointestinal Stromal tumour patients (GIST) were enrolled (informed consent received), one patient was enrolled but had an AE prior to randomisation so were withdrawn from the study. No demographic data were obtained for this patient.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day STS
group.description: 10 Soft Tissue Sarcomas (STS) patients were randomised.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day GIST
group.description: Cediranib 45 mg/Day: 25 patients with Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumour (GIST) randomised

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day STS
group.description: Cediranib 45 mg/Day: 10 patients with Soft Tissue Sarcomas (STS) randomised

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Change in Standardised Uptake Value (SUV)Max at Day 8, Central Review, (GIST) Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumours Patients.
outcome.description: [F 18] Fluoro 2 Deoxy D Glucose - Positron Emission Tomography (FDG-PET). Tumour metabolic activity as assessed by Change in Standardised Uptake Value (SUVMax) at Day 8 (measured by central review), in Patients with GIST tumours. SUVmax at Day 8 minus SUVmax at Baseline.
outcome.population: As per the protocol the analysis was for GIST patients only (not STS patients). For patients to be included in the analysis they had to have scans with readable results at both timepoints (baseline and Day 8).

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day GIST
group.description: 26 Gastrointestinal Stromal tumour patients (GIST) were enrolled (informed consent received), one patient was enrolled but had an AE prior to randomisation so were withdrawn from the study. No demographic data were obtained for this patient.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day STS
group.description: Cediranib 45 mg/Day patients with Soft Tissue Sarcomas (STS): 10 patients randomised and received at least one dose of treatment

measure.population: As per the protocol the analysis was for GIST patients only (not STS patients). For patients to be included in the analysis they had to have scans with readable results at both timepoints (baseline and Day 8).

outcome.description: SUVmax at Day 29 minus SUVmax at baseline, based on central review, GIST patients
outcome.time_frame: FDG-PET assessment at Baseline and 29 days after dosing.
outcome.population: As per the protocol the analysis was for GIST patients only (not STS patients). For patients to be included in the analysis they had to have scans with readable results at both timepoints (baseline and Day 29).

group.description: 26 Gastrointestinal Stromal tumour patients (GIST) were enrolled (informed consent received), one patient was enrolled but had an AE prior to randomisation so were withdrawn from the study. No demographic data were obtained for this patient.

measure.population: As per the protocol the analysis was for GIST patients only (not STS patients). For patients to be included in the analysis they had to have scans with readable results at both timepoints (baseline and Day 29).

outcome.title: Objective Tumour Response, Investigator Review
outcome.description: Number of patients with complete (CR) /partial response (PR) (based on RECIST) as assessed by the Investigator. CR is defined as Disappearance of all target lesions. PR is defined as at least a 30% decrease in the sum of Longest Diameter (LD) of target lesions taking as reference the baseline sum LD.
outcome.time_frame: RECIST at Baseline, Weeks 8, 16 and every 12 weeks thereafter until progression.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day GIST
group.description: 26 Gastrointestinal Stromal tumour patients (GIST) were enrolled (informed consent received), one patient was enrolled but had an AE prior to randomisation so were withdrawn from the study. No demographic data were obtained for this patient.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day STS
group.description: 10 Soft Tissue Sarcomas (STS) patients were randomised.

measure.title: Objective Tumour Response, Investigator Review
measure.description: Number of patients with complete (CR) /partial response (PR) (based on RECIST) as assessed by the Investigator. CR is defined as Disappearance of all target lesions. PR is defined as at least a 30% decrease in the sum of Longest Diameter (LD) of target lesions taking as reference the baseline sum LD.

outcome.title: -Tumour Activity as Measured by Major Axis (Axial Plane) at Week 8 in GIST/STS Patients by Central Review of CT Images.
outcome.description: Central review of CT images taking the longest diameter measured in millimetres at week 8 [major axis (axial plane)] minus the longest diameter measured in millimetres at baseline.
outcome.time_frame: CT assessments at Baseline and Week 8
outcome.population: As per the protocol the formal statistical analysis was performed for the GIST grouppatients only, STS patients were summarised (not STS patients). For patients to be included in the analysis they had to have CT scans at both timepoints (baseline and week 8).

measure.population: As per the protocol the formal statistical analysis was performed for the GIST grouppatients only, STS patients were summarised (not STS patients). For patients to be included in the analysis they had to have CT scans at both timepoints (baseline and week 8).

reported_events.desc: Adverse events are reported for randomised patients who received at least one dose of treatment.

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day GIST
group.description: Cediranib 45 mg/Day patients with Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumour (GIST): 24 patients randomised and received at least one dose of treatment (1 patient was not randomised or dosed and a further 1 patient was randomised but not dosed due to Incorrect enrolmentCediranib)

group.title: Cediranib 45 mg/Day STS
group.description: Cediranib 45 mg/Day patients with Soft Tissue Sarcomas (STS): 10 patients randomised and received at least one dose of treatment.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: If a Study Site, or an investigator, requests permission to publish data from this study, any such publication (including oral presentations) is to be agreed with AstraZeneca prior to publication.
